success.group_creation: successfully created group. It may take a couple of minutes for the changes to propagate

question.perform_create_group: would you like to perform an CREATE_GROUP transaction?

save_options.no_pinned_changes: you currently do not have any changes to your pinned apps
save_options.overwrite_changes: the app was unable to download your existing QDN-saved pinned apps. Would you like to overwrite those changes?
save_options.publish_qdn: would you like to publish your settings to QDN (encrypted)?
save_options.register_name: you need a registered Qortal name to save your pinned apps to QDN.
save_options.reset_pinned: don't like your current local changes? Would you like to reset to the default pinned apps?
save_options.reset_qdn: don't like your current local changes? Would you like to reset to your saved QDN pinned apps?
save_options.settings: you are using the export/import way of saving settings.
save_options.unsaved_changes: you have unsaved changes to your pinned apps. Save them to QDN.
